mapper.sql: TENANT_ID, WEBSITE_NAME, CONTACT_ADDRESS, REGISTER_PHONE, TENANTS_PHONE, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_PHONE, DOMAIN, WEBSITE_URL, WEBSITE_CONSOLE_URL, WEBSITE_LOGO, DUE_DATE, is_usable, privince, city, area, TENANT_STATUS, SALES_PERSON, remarks, TENANT_CODE, apply_time, company_name, licence_no, licence_img, agent_name, id_type, id_number, idcard_Front_img, idcard_Back_img, member_Type, refereeId, recommend_Id, add_time, add_account, modify_time, modify_account
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tenants_apps
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tenants_apps (TENANT_ID, WEBSITE_NAME, CONTACT_ADDRESS, REGISTER_PHONE, TENANTS_PHONE, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_PHONE, DOMAIN, WEBSITE_URL, WEBSITE_CONSOLE_URL, WEBSITE_LOGO, DUE_DATE, is_usable, privince, city, area, TENANT_STATUS, SALES_PERSON, remarks, TENANT_CODE, apply_time, company_name, licence_no, licence_img, agent_name, id_type, id_number, idcard_Front_img, idcard_Back_img, member_Type, refereeId, recommend_Id, add_time, add_account, modify_time, modify_account ) values (#{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{websiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{websiteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{websiteConsoleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{websiteLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenceImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcardFrontImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcardBackImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refereeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recommendId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update tenants_apps
TENANT_ID = #{record.tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WEBSITE_NAME = #{record.websiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_ADDRESS = #{record.contactAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_PHONE = #{record.registerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANTS_PHONE = #{record.tenantsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NAME = #{record.contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PHONE = #{record.contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOMAIN = #{record.domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_URL = #{record.websiteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_CONSOLE_URL = #{record.websiteConsoleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_LOGO = #{record.websiteLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUE_DATE = #{record.dueDate,jdbcType=DATE},
is_usable = #{record.isUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
privince = #{record.privince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{record.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{record.area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANT_STATUS = #{record.tenantStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALES_PERSON = #{record.salesPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANT_CODE = #{record.tenantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_time = #{record.applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
company_name = #{record.companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
licence_no = #{record.licenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
licence_img = #{record.licenceImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_name = #{record.agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_type = #{record.idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_number = #{record.idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard_Front_img = #{record.idcardFrontImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard_Back_img = #{record.idcardBackImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_Type = #{record.memberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refereeId = #{record.refereeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recommend_Id = #{record.recommendId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
add_account = #{record.addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_account = #{record.modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tenants_apps set TENANT_ID = #{record.tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WEBSITE_NAME = #{record.websiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_ADDRESS = #{record.contactAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTER_PHONE = #{record.registerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANTS_PHONE = #{record.tenantsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{record.contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_PHONE = #{record.contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOMAIN = #{record.domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE_URL = #{record.websiteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE_CONSOLE_URL = #{record.websiteConsoleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE_LOGO = #{record.websiteLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUE_DATE = #{record.dueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, is_usable = #{record.isUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, privince = #{record.privince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{record.city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{record.area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_STATUS = #{record.tenantStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_PERSON = #{record.salesPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_CODE = #{record.tenantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_time = #{record.applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, company_name = #{record.companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licence_no = #{record.licenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licence_img = #{record.licenceImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_name = #{record.agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_type = #{record.idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_number = #{record.idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard_Front_img = #{record.idcardFrontImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard_Back_img = #{record.idcardBackImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_Type = #{record.memberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refereeId = #{record.refereeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recommend_Id = #{record.recommendId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_account = #{record.addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_account = #{record.modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tenants_apps
WEBSITE_NAME = #{websiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_ADDRESS = #{contactAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTER_PHONE = #{registerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANTS_PHONE = #{tenantsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PHONE = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOMAIN = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_URL = #{websiteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_CONSOLE_URL = #{websiteConsoleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEBSITE_LOGO = #{websiteLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUE_DATE = #{dueDate,jdbcType=DATE},
is_usable = #{isUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
privince = #{privince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANT_STATUS = #{tenantStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALES_PERSON = #{salesPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANT_CODE = #{tenantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
licence_no = #{licenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
licence_img = #{licenceImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agent_name = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_type = #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard_Front_img = #{idcardFrontImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard_Back_img = #{idcardBackImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_Type = #{memberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refereeId = #{refereeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
recommend_Id = #{recommendId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
add_account = #{addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_account = #{modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tenants_apps set WEBSITE_NAME = #{websiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_ADDRESS = #{contactAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTER_PHONE = #{registerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANTS_PHONE = #{tenantsPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_PHONE = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOMAIN = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE_URL = #{websiteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE_CONSOLE_URL = #{websiteConsoleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBSITE_LOGO = #{websiteLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUE_DATE = #{dueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, is_usable = #{isUsable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, privince = #{privince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_STATUS = #{tenantStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_PERSON = #{salesPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_CODE = #{tenantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licence_no = #{licenceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licence_img = #{licenceImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agent_name = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_type = #{idType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard_Front_img = #{idcardFrontImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard_Back_img = #{idcardBackImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_Type = #{memberType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refereeId = #{refereeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recommend_Id = #{recommendId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_account = #{addAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_account = #{modifyAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from tenants_apps where TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and is_usable='1'

SELECT a.TOTAL_AMOUNT "totalAmount", a.FROZEN_AMOUNT "frozenAmount", a.AVAILABLE_AMOUNT "availableAmount", b.BANK_NAME "bankName", b.BANK_CODE "bankCode"
FROM tenants_funds a ,tenants_bank_cards b where a.TENANT_ID = b.TENANT_ID and a.TENANT_ID = #{a.TENANT_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.is_usable = '1'

SELECT a.add_time "addTime", a.DUE_DATE "dueDate", FUNC_GET_CODE_NAME("STORE_STATUS",a.TENANT_STATUS,"1") "tenantStatus", a.TENANT_CODE "tenantCode", a.WEBSITE_NAME "tenantName", a.CONTACT_ADDRESS "contactAddress", a.add_account "addAccount", a.CONTACT_PHONE "contactPhone", a.SALES_PERSON "salesPerson", a.WEBSITE_URL "websiteUrl" from tenants_apps a where a.TENANT_ID = #{a.TENANT_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.is_usable = '1'
select count(0) FROM tenants_apps a left join tenants_funds b on a.TENANT_ID = b.TENANT_ID WHERE 1=1

SELECT a.TENANT_ID "tenantId", a.WEBSITE_NAME "tenantName", a.CONTACT_ADDRESS "contactAddress", a.REGISTER_PHONE "registerPhone", a.CONTACT_NAME "contactName", a.CONTACT_PHONE "contactPhone", IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT(a.DUE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d ') ,"")AS "dueDate", a.is_usable "isUsable", a.privince "privince", a.city "city", a.area "area", a.TENANT_STATUS "tenantStatus", a.SALES_PERSON "salesPerson", a.member_Type "memberType", DATE_FORMAT(a.apply_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') "applyTime", DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') "addTime", IFNULL (b.AVAILABLE_AMOUNT ,0.00)AS "availableAmount" FROM tenants_apps a left join tenants_funds b on a.TENANT_ID = b.TENANT_ID WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY a.add_time DESC limit #{pageNumber},#{pageSize}

SELECT a.WEBSITE_NAME "tenantName", a.privince "privince", a.city "city", IFNULL(a.area ,"")AS "area", a.CONTACT_ADDRESS "contactAddress", a.TENANTS_PHONE "tenantsPhone", a.CONTACT_NAME "contactName", a.CONTACT_PHONE "contactPhone", a.DOMAIN "domain", b.login_account "loginAccount", b.password "password", a.recommend_Id "recommendId", IFNULL(c.TOTAL_AMOUNT ,0.00)AS "totalAmount", IFNULL(c.FROZEN_AMOUNT ,0.00)AS "frozenAmount", IFNULL(c.AVAILABLE_AMOUNT ,0.00)AS "availableAmount", d.account_Type "accountType", d.BANK_NAME "bankName", d.BANK_CODE "bankCodes", s.BANK_NAME "bankCode", d.BANK_SEC_NAME "bankSecName", d.CARD_NO "cardNo", a.member_Type "memberType", a.TENANT_STATUS "tenantStatus", a.DUE_DATE "dueDate", a.apply_time "applyTime", a.company_name "companyName", a.licence_no "licenceNo", a.agent_name "agentName", a.id_number "idNumber", a.SALES_PERSON "salesPerson", a.WEBSITE_LOGO "websiteLogo", a.licence_img "licenceImg", a.idcard_Front_img "idcardFrontImg", a.idcard_Back_img "idcardBackImg" from tenants_apps a LEFT JOIN tenants_users b ON a.TENANT_ID = b.tenant_id LEFT JOIN tenants_funds c ON a.TENANT_ID = c.TENANT_ID LEFT JOIN tenants_bank_cards d ON a.TENANT_ID = d.TENANT_ID LEFT JOIN bank s on d.BANK_CODE=s.BANK_CODE and s.SYS_CODE='HVPS' WHERE a.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
